title: Dia5 Guy LF Dominion Team
body:
Hi guys,

It might sound weird, but Dominion is my favourite mode to play.
Therefore i´m looking for a Dominion Team, wich competes at tournaments.
I would love a German Team, but got no problems with english teams.
I got a working headset and ts3/skype.
It would be a pleasure for me if you contact me ingame or comment my post :)

IGN: Beerlike

I´m looking forward to play with you, 
Your maxi/Beerlike
